resources.string:
Unable to verify license.

Some causes of this problem include:
 • There is no Internet connection.
 • This application has been tampered with.

Check your Internet connection, and if necessary, try installing the app from the Play Store again.
Link Bubble Pro purchase verified!\n\nThank you so much for supporting me as I develop this project.

Google Play is reporting this copy of Link Bubble Pro is unlicensed.\n\nAssuming you have indeed purchased a copy of Link Bubble Pro, the most common reason for this is that email address used for your purchase is not configured with the Play Store on this device.

Note: you don\'t need to load Link Bubble Pro again, but you do need to keep it installed for verification purposes.\n\nThis app will be hidden throughout the system so it doesn\'t appear in your launcher(s).
